title: Compulsive car thief
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Automobile theft

description: Presents the case history of a 21-year-old prison inmate who has been stealing cars and getting caught since he was 10 years old, pointing out that his behaviour has continued to baffle his parents, and the court. Poses the question: is the psychopath a medical or legal problem?
